siteMetadata.title: Graphopedia - catalogue of graph and chart types
siteMetadata.description: Complete catalogue of infographics and data visualizations. Explore different types of charts, graphs and diagrams.

nodes.description: Do you know what is an infographic and why they work?
About 60% of the world population are visual learners. Learn how to think visually.
Make an infographic without hiring a designer with Adioma.
